thread.section_title: LymphedemaProducts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LymphedemaProducts.com | lymphedemaproducts.com | 3 of 131
thread.title: Noreen

author: Noreen
title: Noreen
text: Navigating to a site to order what are essentially medical devices is a potentially daunting prospect. Lymphedema Products made the experience as easy as it could be. Their site is well designed so it was easy to find what I needed. A follow up message from their Assistant Director of Sales was an especially nice touch. My order has arrived. I would recommend this vendor to anyone.
